name: Checking In
message: #greeting #firstName, and welcome to #company! Room #roomNumber is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything!

name: Restaurant Recommendations
message: If you're looking for somewhere to eat #firstName, try out #company restaurant right downstairs in the lobby.

name: Checking Out
message: Thanks for staying at #company, #firstName. Come back soon! We'll have Room #roomNumber ready anytime.
